solution_line_template: She spends {days_per_week} * {hours_per_day} hours = <<{days_per_week}*{hours_per_day}={hours_per_week}>>{hours_per_week} hours per week delivering flyers.
She has spent a total of {hours_per_week} hours/week * {num_weeks} weeks = <<{hours_per_week}*{num_weeks}={total_hours}>>{total_hours} hours delivering flyers.
She has earned a total of {total_hours} hours * ${hourly_rate}/hour = $<<{total_hours}*{hourly_rate}={total_earned}>>{total_earned}.
